/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the setting sun. Cars and bicycles are scattered along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. In the distance, trees can be seen lining the street, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban environment. The image is a blend of man-made structures and natural elements, creating a harmonious balance that is characteristic of Beijing's cityscape.
